businesslayer

Class StudentBusinessLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • businesslayer.StudentBusinessLogic

  • public class StudentBusinessLogic
extends java.lang.Object
    The StudentBusinessLogic class provides business logic methods for the Student object. It interacts with the data access layer to perform CRUD operations on StudentDTO objects. Assignment 2 Class: CST8288 - Lab Section: 013 Lab Professor: Siju Philip Date: Mar. 30, 2023
